featured.text: The 60 pilot whales swam ashore as a result of (A) a large winter storm off the coast of Cape Cod. (B) a behavior currently unknown to scientists.
The Chinese variety, a strong plant that can grow to be 2.75 meters high, can live to be 100 years old and survives cold winters.
Since the orange trees suffered _____ damage from a storm in the summer, the farmers are expecting a sharp decline in harvests this winter.
In winter, our skin tends to become dry and _____, a problem which is usually treated by applying lotions or creams.

other.text: Some see it as a celebration related to the turn of the seasons from winter to spring; others, however, believe that it 16 the adoption of a new calendar.
An extremely mild winter allowed more mosquitoes than usual to survive, while the unusually high temperatures in that scorching summer further increased their number by speeding up their life cycle.

definition.zh_def: 冬季，四季之一，通常指氣候寒冷的月份。
definition.en_def: The coldest season of the year, occurring between autumn and spring.
definition.example: I love to go skiing in the winter.
